mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, code AS code, payment_no AS paymentNo, waybill_code AS waybillCode, waybill_no AS waybillNo, billing_class AS billingClass, last_print_no AS lastPrintNo, confirmed_tran_fee AS confirmedTranFee, tran_fee_unit_code AS tranFeeUnitCode, confirmed_driving_fee AS confirmedDrivingFee, confirmed_driving_fee_unit_code AS confirmedDrivingFeeUnitCode, confirmed_total_fee AS confirmedTotalFee, total_fee_unit_code AS totalFeeUnitCode, total_fee_unit_name AS totalFeeUnitName, actual_fee AS actualFee, actual_fee_unit_code AS actualFeeUnitCode, actual_fee_unit_name AS actualFeeUnitName, pay_method AS payMethod, pay_status AS payStatus, pay_request_org_code AS payRequestOrgCode, pay_request_org_name AS payRequestOrgName, pay_request_user_code AS payRequestUserCode, pay_request_user_full_name AS payRequestUserFullName, pay_request_time AS payRequestTime, payer_org_code AS payerOrgCode, payer_org_name AS payerOrgName, payer_op_code AS payerOpCode, payer_op_full_name AS payerOpFullName, payer_op_time AS payerOpTime, payee_user_code AS payeeUserCode, payee_user_full_name AS payeeUserFullName, payee_bank_name AS payeeBankName, payee_bank_branch_name AS payeeBankBranchName, payee_bank_account_full_name AS payeeBankAccountFullName, payee_bank_account_no AS payeeBankAccountNo, description AS description, remark AS remark, disabled AS disabled, deleted AS deleted, module_code AS moduleCode, creator_user_code AS creatorUserCode, creator_username AS creatorUsername, create_time AS createTime, update_user_code AS updateUserCode, update_username AS updateUsername, update_time AS updateTime, ip AS ip, operator_longitude AS operatorLongitude, operator_latitude AS operatorLatitude, owner_user_code AS ownerUserCode, owner_org_code AS ownerOrgCode, owner_org_name AS ownerOrgName, synchronous_id AS synchronousId FROM waybill_paybill WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waybill_paybill ( code, payment_no, waybill_code, waybill_no, billing_class, last_print_no, confirmed_tran_fee, tran_fee_unit_code, confirmed_driving_fee, confirmed_driving_fee_unit_code, confirmed_total_fee, total_fee_unit_code, total_fee_unit_name, actual_fee, actual_fee_unit_code, actual_fee_unit_name, pay_method, pay_status, pay_request_org_code, pay_request_org_name, pay_request_user_code, pay_request_user_full_name, pay_request_time, payer_org_code, payer_org_name, payer_op_code, payer_op_full_name, payer_op_time, payee_user_code, payee_user_full_name, payee_bank_name, payee_bank_branch_name, payee_bank_account_full_name, payee_bank_account_no, description, remark, disabled, deleted, module_code, creator_user_code, creator_username, create_time, update_user_code, update_username, update_time, ip, operator_longitude, operator_latitude, owner_user_code, owner_org_code, owner_org_name, synchronous_id ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{paymentNo}, #{waybillCode}, #{waybillNo}, #{billingClass}, #{lastPrintNo}, #{confirmedTranFee}, #{tranFeeUnitCode}, #{confirmedDrivingFee}, #{confirmedDrivingFeeUnitCode}, #{confirmedTotalFee}, #{totalFeeUnitCode}, #{totalFeeUnitName}, #{actualFee}, #{actualFeeUnitCode}, #{actualFeeUnitName}, #{payMethod}, #{payStatus}, #{payRequestOrgCode}, #{payRequestOrgName}, #{payRequestUserCode}, #{payRequestUserFullName}, #{payRequestTime}, #{payerOrgCode}, #{payerOrgName}, #{payerOpCode}, #{payerOpFullName}, #{payerOpTime}, #{payeeUserCode}, #{payeeUserFullName}, #{payeeBankName}, #{payeeBankBranchName}, #{payeeBankAccountFullName}, #{payeeBankAccountNo}, #{description}, #{remark}, #{disabled}, #{deleted}, #{moduleCode}, #{creatorUserCode}, #{creatorUsername}, #{createTime}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateUsername}, #{updateTime}, #{ip}, #{operatorLongitude}, #{operatorLatitude}, #{ownerUserCode}, #{ownerOrgCode}, #{ownerOrgName}, #{synchronousId} )
mapper.update:
